name: buddy the snowman
notes:
**size**
one size

**measurement**
34 cm / 13.5” high

**material**
friends wool 
1 skein of colour 01 – yarn a
1 skein of colour 77 – yarn b
1 skein of colour 29 – yarn c

daily stitch wool blend tweed 
1 skein of colour 12 – yarn c

knitting needles 3.25 mm (uk 10 /us 5)
stitch markers
toy stuffing
darning needle
black safety eyes, 2 x 9 mm
black safety eyes, 3 x 10 mm (for buttons)

**yarn quality**
friends wool hobbii 
100% wool
50 g (1.76 oz) = 100 m (109 yds) 

**gauge**
26 sts x 30 rows = 10 x 10 cm / 4” x 4”) st st square

**pattern information**
this cute snowman character is a quick and easy knitting project.

the base is kept flat with a disc of cardboard - you can leave this out if the snowman is going to be loved as a toy. if the snowman will be gifted to a young child, embroider the eyes and buttons.

the snowman is completed with a long warm scarf wrapped twice around his neck and pointed hat with a ribbed fold back brim.

pattern is suitable for beginner knitters.
